name: Plant of Earth
description:
This game made upon a theme "Bad is good".

In this game Carbon Dioxide for is bad for civilization but in order to protect the civilization trees have to be produce oxygen by using those Carbon Dioxide.

Player need to select a tree from game bar and plant toward the city. When Carbon Dioxide is greater than oxygen then game will over.

Used assets: 

  •  https://www.spriters-resource.com/fullview/103196/
  •  https://www.zapsplat.com/?s=fart&post_type=music&sound-effect-category-id
  • https://favpng.com/png_view/isometric-building-isometric-projection-isometric-gr...
  •  https://www.glitchthegame.com/downloads/

and so on...
